topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a4694d6368724c91000cbc#post_55a4694d6368724c91000cbc
[bq="mariomarc"]"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a4691b636872173100029e#post_55a4691b636872173100029e
Wait, is Doomsday in it too?[/bq]
I'll admit; I may not like super hero films, but I would pay fucking everything in my wallet to watch a Doomsday film.

It would be a incredibly good way to wrap up the new generation of dc films by having superman die again cause everyone has to admit the superman comics peaked in sales during Doomsday and they took a utter massive shit sales wise afterwards.

If DC wants to make a superman movie that sells fuck tons of tickets make a Doomsday movie.

Yeah fuck you driving), and I got called regarding a job interview. Today has been gud.
